name: Spartoi Meadow
description:
Mischa and the traveler Silvia on their way back to their village.
The meadow troublemakers stand in the way.

Main features:
Explore an area and defeat a boss in an ActionRPG that aims at the next area.

Symbol encounter battle.
Avoid battles by hitting and avoiding symbols.
Or you can fight to get rewards (experience gems, weapons, and armor).

There are two main characters, but the AI controls the main character that the player does not control during the battle.

Get experience gems to equip new weapons and armor to strengthen your character.

There are checkpoints in each area that serve as warp points and save points.

Experience gems, weapons, and armor can also be found in the area.
If you find them, your adventure will be a lot easier.

Battle:
Use 2 types of weak and strong attacks to defeat the enemies.

If you get attacked by an enemy while "standing still" or "walking", the guard will be activated automatically. You will take no damage while on guard.

If you go straight at the enemy, you may lose.
Use moves such as walk, step, and dash to get around and
Let's hit the attack from the blind spot.
